actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide additional compensation under section 314(k) of such title to veterans with service-connected heart conditions who have had a heart valve replaced and a pacemaker implanted.

summary.text: Entitles war veterans with service-connected heart conditions who have had a heart valve replaced and a pacemaker implanted to additional monthly disability compensation.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide additional compensation under section 314(k) of such title to veterans with service-connected heart conditions who have had a heart valve replaced and a pacemaker implanted.
